parameterdescription.para: A spline builder which calculates the coefficients of a spline representation.
A spline evaluator which provides the value of a spline representation from its coefficients.

briefdescription.para: An operator which calculates the solution $\phi$ to Poisson's equation: $ -\Delta \phi = \rho $.

parameterdescription.para: The right-hand side of Poisson's equation.

simplesect.para: A reference to the solution to Poisson's equation.

memberdef.argsstring: (field_type phi, vector_field_type E, field_type rho) const override
memberdef.name: operator()

briefdescription.para: An operator which calculates the solution $\phi$ to Poisson's equation and its derivative: $ - \Delta \phi = \rho $ $ E = - \nabla \phi $.

parameterdescription.para: The negative derivative of the solution to Poisson's equation.
The right-hand side of Poisson's equation.

simplesect.para: A reference to the solution to Poisson's equation.

parameterdescription.para: The spline coefficients which will describe the result on the FEM basis.
The function on the right hand side of the equation at the interpolation points.

detaileddescription.para: A class to solve the following equation: $ -\Delta \phi = \rho $ using a Finite Element Method.

parameterdescription.para: An evaluator which can be used to evaluate splines.
